LanguageData.MisterHandy.label: Mr. Handy
LanguageData.MisterHandy.description: Mr. Handy is a very bright representative of the serial model of spherical robots, carefully produced and mass-produced throughout the territory of pre-war Equestria. The roles of a butler, a gatekeeper, a personal bodyguard or even a doctor are far from all that Mister Handy could cope with in the most wonderful way.
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.0.label: left bladed fist
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.1.label: right bladed fist
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.MisterGutsy.label: Mr. Gutsy
LanguageData.MisterGutsy.description: Mister Gutsy is the perfect soldier if your idea of ​​a soldier is a cross between a sadistic NCO, a coffee machine, and a tank. Created for army officials who believed that politeness was a sign of weakness, this brave robot is ready to follow any order, even if that order is to shoot at his own for “non-regulation appearance.”.
LanguageData.MisterGutsy.tools.0.label: left bladed fist
LanguageData.MisterGutsy.tools.1.label: right bladed fist
LanguageData.MisterGutsy.tools.2.label: head
